title: sh/bash executor not emitting CHUNK events to StreamBus for format adapters
description: When using 'stream sh { ... }' the FormatAdapterSink doesn't receive CHUNK events. Works with 'stream cmd { ... }'. FormatAdapterSink.handle never called for sh/bash executors.
